XBram Struct Reference

#include <xbram.h>

List of all members.

Public Attributes

XBram_Config Config
u32 IsReady

Detailed Description

The XBram driver instance data. The user is required to allocate a variable of this type for every BRAM device in the system. A pointer to a variable of this type is then passed to the driver API functions.
